name: Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack with Bonus
name_original: Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack with Bonus
description:
'Attack on Titan 2: Final Battle Upgrade Pack' contains the latest content for the tactical hunting action series based on the hit anime series 'Attack on Titan.'

■Includes the stories from seasons 1~3 of the anime!
■Playable characters have been added!
■The new equipment 'Thunder Spear' has been added!
■The new equipment 'Anti-personnel Omni-directional Mobility Gear' has been added!
■The new mode 'Territory Recovery Mode' has been added!

【Early Purchase Bonus】
Purchase before August 1, 2019 to get below DLC.

Christa 'Queen of Historia' Costume
Levi 'Plain Clothes (Underground City)' Costume
Kenny 'Coat (Young Male)' Costume
Mikasa 'One-piece Dress' Costume

[Warning] This is update data for the game Attack on Titan 2. It will not work without the original game.
To use these contents, the original game is required. In addition, please be sure to have the latest update for the original game prior to use.
This item is also offered in a pack.
